channel.title: Vps help. centos 32bit. linux on windows. xp
channel.description: i really need help with my vps i can' not understand how to do this :( i tried for hours trial and error nothing please help :(!!!! [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/25gsyg5.jpg[/img] please some one help:( i tried to connect nothing is working. it saying u can't connect to this computer when i went to . the remote control on windows xp. so i downloaded . filezilla. i can see the files but i dont no where. i can take off the denied . part. please help ik it might be an easy task. but please. god bless u all. i will give u paypal money i have only like 3. dollairs on their please :((((((

item.title: Vps help. centos 32bit. linux on windows. xp
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

tip for putty: in settings go to selection, change the action of mouse buttons to xterm, this means middle mouse button will paste and right click merely selects

but what t4 said will solve your problem

Read full topic

item.title: Vps help. centos 32bit. linux on windows. xp
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

you probably don’t have execute permissions on that file:

chmod +x jdk-6u24-linux-i586-rpm.bin

Read full topic
